Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class is the server class and it never ends, it manages the lobby creation and creation of threads which duty is to manage games, it creates ServerClientListenerThread class to communicate with clients and this class expose Thread safe method to modify the state of the lobby.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    This method adds a player to the lobby if the lobby already exists, if not it creates the lobby with temporary dimension of 1 and throws a FirstPlayerException which says to the executing thread that is has to ask to the player.
    private void createGame()
    This method create a game where players are going to play, it creates a RemoteView for each client and connects it to its handler, at the end it calls the method generateOrder() on the controller in order to create a playing order.
    int getClientPosition​(ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    Returns the client position in the lobby
    int getLobbyDimension()
    Returns the dimension of the lobby
    boolean getToBeCreated()
    Returns if the lobby needs the user input for the player number
    void isNowPrepared​(ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    It store the handler in a list of prepared handlers, it means that the handler and the player connected to it are ready to start a game.
    void removePlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    This method remove a player because it has gone offline for some reason or it has disconnected.
    void run()  
    void setPlayerNumber​(int dimension, ServerClientListenerThread handler)
    It sets the number of players of the game chosen by the first player who connected to the server, it can only be called by the handler of the first player of the lobby.
    void updatePlayerInLobby()
    It updates players about the current number of players inside the lobby.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • addPlayer

      public int addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler) throws FirstPlayerException
      This method adds a player to the lobby if the lobby already exists, if not it creates the lobby with temporary dimension of 1 and throws a FirstPlayerException which says to the executing thread that is has to ask to the player.
      Parameters:
      name - it is the name that the player would like to use in this game
      handler - it is the client messages handler
      Returns:
      0 if the player can't be added because there is already a player with the same name or name parameter is null, 1 if the player has been added to a match, 2 the game is starting
      Throws:
      FirstPlayerException - if this exception is thrown it means that the player must choose the number of player and let the server to create the lobby

    • updatePlayerInLobby

      public void updatePlayerInLobby()
      It updates players about the current number of players inside the lobby.

    • isNowPrepared

      public void isNowPrepared​(ServerClientListenerThread handler) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      It store the handler in a list of prepared handlers, it means that the handler and the player connected to it are ready to start a game.
      Parameters:
      handler - an handler of a client that is now prepared
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the handler is not an handler of a player of the game
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the handler is already saved in the preparedListeners list

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String name, ServerClientListenerThread handler) throws AlreadyStartedException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method remove a player because it has gone offline for some reason or it has disconnected.
      Parameters:
      name - it is the name that the player would like to use in this game
      handler - it is the client messages handler
      Throws:
      AlreadyStartedException - if the match is already started this exception is thrown
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • setPlayerNumber

      public void setPlayerNumber​(int dimension, ServerClientListenerThread handler) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.IllegalStateException
      It sets the number of players of the game chosen by the first player who connected to the server, it can only be called by the handler of the first player of the lobby.
      Parameters:
      dimension - This is the number of player for the game
      handler - This is the thread that is calling the function
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - The thread that called this method isn't the one that hold the connection for the first player
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The dimension passed is different from 2 or 3
      java.lang.IllegalStateException

    • getClientPosition

      public int getClientPosition​(ServerClientListenerThread handler) throws java.lang.IllegalCallerException
      Returns the client position in the lobby
      Parameters:
      handler - This is the handler for a client
      Returns:
      return the position in the lobby for that client
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalCallerException - The thread that called this method isn't a thread which represent a client

    • getToBeCreated

      public boolean getToBeCreated()
      Returns if the lobby needs the user input for the player number
      Returns:
      return true if the lobby needs the user input for the player number

    • getLobbyDimension

      public int getLobbyDimension()
      Returns the dimension of the lobby
      Returns:
      dimension of the lobby

    • createGame

      private void createGame()
      This method create a game where players are going to play, it creates a RemoteView for each client and connects it to its handler, at the end it calls the method generateOrder() on the controller in order to create a playing order.
